results.name: wordpress-setup/wordpress-5ff6cf495f-zkwbb

error.Text: Readiness probe failed: HTTP probe failed with statuscode: 500

results.details:
Error: The readiness probe failed because the application returned a 500 status code, indicating an internal server error.

Solution: 
1. Check application logs for errors.
2. Ensure all dependencies are running.
3. Verify configuration settings.
4. Restart the application.

results.name: wordpress-setup/wordpress

error.Text: Service has not ready endpoints, pods: [Pod/wordpress-5ff6cf495f-zkwbb], expected 1

results.details:
Error: The service can't find any ready endpoints because the specified pod isn't ready.

Solution: 
1. Check pod status with `kubectl get pods`.
2. Inspect pod details using `kubectl describe pod wordpress-5ff6cf495f-zkwbb`.
3. Resolve any issues found (e.g., image pull errors, failed liveness probes).
4. Ensure the pod becomes ready.
